Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Increases the camera FOV in 3D levels to match the open-zone.

Elements.Name: nitroHitstopDuration
Description: Sets the hitstop duration for collecting a Nitro bottle.
NOTE: 0 still has a very miniscule amount of hitstop.

Elements.Name: hitstopDuration
Description: Sets the hitstop duration for boosting into enemies.
NOTE: 0 still has a very miniscule amount of hitstop.

Elements.Name: enableBoostSound
Description: Plays the boost background sound effect from Unleashed, Colors, Generations, and Forces.

Elements.Name: enableBoostVFX
Description: Adds cyber visual effects to Sonic when boosting.

Elements.Name: enableSlideVFX
Description: Adds dust cloud particles to Sonic when sliding/braking.

Elements.Name: enableSpindash
Description: Restores the Spin Dash in Cyber Space, if unlocked.
NOTE: this mod is not balanced around the spindash, and unexpected issues may occur.
Increases the camera volume FOV in 3D levels to match the open-zone.
Increases the camera volume FOV in 3D levels to match the open-zone.
